name: Godson Worship
description: A tradition older than myth and a myth older than tradition. That is the faith of the Lord of Luminence. And you happen to be a devout follower of the Luminous Lord. May His radiance touch your soul and transport it to the highest heaven.

name: Irreligious
description: Although you accept the logical necessity of a first mover and the prime aspect and maintainer of all existence, you grew up without much religious influence. As a result, you have not fallen into the 'for or against' argument so many who encounter religion during adolescence suffer from. Hence, you do not worship a deity; no deity shall accommodate you.

name: Godson Apostate
description: The Lord has blest thee with His Benevolence. Thou art on the right path. Thou Art.

name: Godson Saint
description: The Lord has blest thee with His Providence. Thou art on the orthodox path. Thou Art.

name: Godson Incarnate
description: Thou art the Lord who has blest Thee with Thine Own Divinity. Thou Art.
